When you cast this spell, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose from it a nonland card with mana value 3 or less and a card with mana value 4 or greater. That player discards those cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An enigma as vexing as life itself.

property.value: You may cast Eternal Scourge from exile. When Eternal Scourge becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, exile Eternal Scourge.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Upon discovering what had become of her sisters, Sigarda could only weep.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Courageous Outrider enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a Human card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One silvery blast signaled that she wouldn't be arriving at Thraben alone.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After facing so many horrors, the survivors of Videns parish couldn't comprehend the hope that the gryff represented.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top seven cards of your library. Put up to two planeswalker cards from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gideon and Liliana may not have seen eye to eye, but that did not stop them from fighting side by side.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Desperate Sentry dies, create a 3/2 colorless Eldrazi Horror creature token. Delirium - Desperate Sentry gets +3/+0 as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) When Drogskol Shieldmate enters the battlefield, other creatures you control get +0/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I will join you so that you will not yet join me."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Eldrazi you control have vigilance. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice a non-Eldrazi creature: Create a 3/2 colorless Eldrazi Horror creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After the end, a new beginning.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Extricator of Sin enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice another permanent. If you do, create a 3/2 colorless Eldrazi Horror creature token. Delirium - At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, transform Extricator of Sin.

property.value: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've seen cathars riding to battle without a hint of fear. Perhaps that is its own sort of madness." - Esler, Havengul mercenary

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Fiend Binder attacks, tap target creature defending player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She had not believed any shred of humanity remained in these writhing monsters until the twisted form of her partner appeared before her.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The flicker of candlelight and the echo of hymns told the villagers that the monastery wasn't truly abandoned.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She now hears only Emrakul's murmurs.

property.value: Target creature gets +2/+6 until end of turn and can block any number of creatures this turn.

property.value: When Guardian of Pilgrims enters the battlefield, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Immune to the physical warping caused by Emrakul, geists proved to be some of humanity's most important allies.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ironclad Slayer enters the battlefield, you may return target Aura or Equipment card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The best weapon is the one at hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: ". . . but until this morning, I'd never seen them be of one body." - Ulda, Gavony Rider

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike, lifelink At the beginning of the end step, if you gained 3 or more life this turn, transform Lone Rider.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Horse and rider are often of one mind." - Ulda, Gavony Rider

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature. At the beginning of the next end step, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The person who finishes a journey is rarely the same as the one who starts it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}, Discard a card: You gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not all minds touched by the Eldrazi turn to raging psychosis. Some simply withdraw from this world into memories of a better one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may reveal this card from your opening hand. If you do, at the beginning of the first upkeep, your life total becomes 26. Your life total becomes 26.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is power in prayer, regardless of who is listening.

property.value: Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn by non-Human sources.

property.value: "Fight for a better future, even if you may not live to see it." - Grete, Order of Saint Traft

property.value: Flying Sacrifice Selfless Spirit: Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

property.value: Create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying. You gain 2 life.

property.value: "Salvation will not be granted by the Lunarch Council. It must be earned - at the edge of a sword, if necessary."

property.value: "I'll see you soon, Subjects 25 and 26. I've got a good feeling this time!"

property.value: "At last! Proof that it's not all in my head!"

property.value: "You have to admit, Gideon - he has great form." - Liliana Vess

property.value: The surviving members of the Markov bloodline drove through a crush of horrors to reclaim their ancestral home.

property.value: "It's not work if you enjoy it."

property.value: Your thoughts are no longer your own.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Up to two target creatures each get +1/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn. Madness {1}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Alchemist's Greeting deals 4 damage to target creature. Madness {1}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Assembled Alphas blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, Assembled Alphas deals 3 damage to that creature and 3 damage to that creature's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is always a toll to pay for passage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard. Prowess When Bedlam Reveler enters the battlefield, discard your hand, then draw three cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control gains double strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some claim that rage is a cloud that obscures thought and vision. But I can assure you - I've never seen with greater clarity."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{R}: Bold Impaler gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Burning with hatred for Nahiri, the Voldaren and Markov forces assaulted the warped Markov Manor with a collective fury not seen in centuries.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Escalate {3} (Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.) Choose one or both - • Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn. • Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Brazen Wolves attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With fewer patrols about, Kessig's roads have become prime hunting grounds.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Escalate {1} (Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.) Choose one or more - • Target player discards all the cards in their hand, then draws that many cards. • Collective Defiance deals 4 damage to target creature. • Collective Defiance deals 3 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Conduit of Emrakul attacks, add {C}{C} at the beginning of your next main phase this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Conduit of Storms attacks, add {R} at the beginning of your next main phase this turn. {3}{R}{R}: Transform Conduit of Storms.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It strikes with the fury of a tempest.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When you confront a wolf scorned by its pack, extra caution is the order of the day." - Raf Gyel of the Quiver of Kessig

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn. Madness {R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Each day there are new reports of homes along Getander Pass and Hofsaddel falling to vampires of a more savage nature. I've even heard tell that Anje Falkenrath has returned. Please send whatever help you can." - Sterin Gorn, letter to Thalia

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may discard a card. If you do, Furyblade Vampire gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Writhe all you want, filth. It will do you no good."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Galvanic Bombardment deals X damage to target creature, where X is 2 plus the number of cards named Galvanic Bombardment in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Geist-powered devices have no shortage of fuel.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Hanweir Garrison attacks, create two 1/1 red Human creature tokens that are tapped and attacking. (Melds with Hanweir Battlements.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample, haste Whenever Hanweir, the Writhing Township attacks, create two 3/2 colorless Eldrazi Horror creature tokens that are tapped and attacking.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent gains control of target permanent you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample, haste When Impetuous Devils attacks, up to one target creature defending player controls blocks it this combat if able. At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Impetuous Devils.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Incendiary Flow deals 3 damage to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What's your plan?" Gideon asked. "Are you serious?" Chandra replied.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Insatiable Gorgers attacks each combat if able. Madness {3}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Drink deeply, for there is no tomorrow!" - Anje Falkenrath

property.name: Rules
property.value: Make Mischief deals 1 damage to any target. Create a 1/1 red Devil creature token. It has "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A tidy desk is as good as an invitation.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell that targets only Mirrorwing Dragon, that player copies that spell for each other creature they control that the spell could target. Each copy targets a different one of those creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard X cards. Nahiri's Wrath deals damage equal to the total mana value of the discarded cards to each of up to X target creatures and/or planeswalkers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. When that creature dies this turn, create a 3/2 colorless Eldrazi Horror creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A tiny crack is enough to open the mind to Emrakul.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has haste and "{T}, Discard a card: Draw a card."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Keep your herons and shrews! You will find nothing in the moon, for the moon is a lie! It has told me so!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Escalate {1} (Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.) Choose one or more - • Creatures target player controls gain trample until end of turn. • Savage Alliance deals 2 damage to target creature. • Savage Alliance deals 1 damage to each creature target opponent controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return up to one target instant card and up to one target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand, then discard a card. Exile Shreds of Sanity.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A few gnawing thoughts can eat at the mind until nothing else remains.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Erupting Dreadwolf attacks, it deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: ". . . heck, I'd settle for anything that even resembled a werewolf." - Raf Gyel of the Quiver of Kessig

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Smoldering Werewolf enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to each of up to two target creatures. {4}{R}{R}: Transform Smoldering Werewolf.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Never thought I'd see the day I'd be wishing to see just a plain old werewolf." - Raf Gyel of the Quiver of Kessig

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spreading Flames deals 6 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hang on. I'm just tidying up." - Chandra Nalaar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Stensia Banquet deals damage to target opponent or planeswalker equal to the number of Vampires you control. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We can't win a war on an empty stomach, can we?" - Olivia Voldaren

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Stensia Innkeeper enters the battlefield, tap target land an opponent controls. That land doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The perils of the road, you say? Don't worry. You won't have to face those again."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Stromkirk Occultist deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card. Madness {1}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender {T}: Thermo-Alchemist deals 1 damage to each opponent. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, untap Thermo-Alchemist.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Madness can't touch a mind ignited by genius."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample {1}: Dronepack Kindred gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: These new terrors will not recede with the setting of the moon.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample {R}: Vildin-Pack Outcast gets +1/-1 until end of turn. {5}{R}{R}: Transform Vildin-Pack Outcast.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Weaver of Lightning deals 1 damage to target creature an opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Lightning in a bottle? That's not where I need it."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Delirium - Backwoods Survivalists gets +1/+1 and has trample as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Paranoia has driven some Kessig communities to hunt down anything - and anyone - that travels through their woods.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you sacrifice another permanent, put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodbriar.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is a sourness here that I don't understand. When the land reaches out to me, I hesitate to reach back." - Nissa Revane

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn. It deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What worked to bring down angels will do the same for these horrors." - Rem Karolus, Slayer of Eldrazi

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may mill a card. Delirium - {2}{G}, Sacrifice Crop Sigil: Return up to one target creature card and up to one target land card from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}, {T}: Target attacking Human gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "May the steel of your blade match the steel in your soul."

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Search your library for a creature card with mana value X or less, where X is 2 plus the sacrificed creature's mana value. Put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Exile Eldritch Evolution.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice Emrakul's Evangel and any number of other non-Eldrazi creatures: Create a 3/2 colorless Eldrazi Horror creature token for each creature sacrificed this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In times like these, be particularly wary of those who claim they can save your soul." - Alena, trapper of Kessig

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an Eldrazi creature spell with mana value 7 or greater, draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hordes of Eldrazi and cultists swarmed over Thraben's defenses, and the members of the Gatewatch found themselves overrun.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Foul Emissary enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. When you sacrifice Foul Emissary while casting a spell with emerge, create a 3/2 colorless Eldrazi Horror creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch Delirium - Gnarlwood Dryad gets +2/+2 as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As Emrakul's influence radiated across Innistrad, evacuation from Kessig's remote villages became increasingly difficult.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mill three cards, then you may return a creature or land card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Emrakul does not grant wishes. Desires simply align to her will.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Hamlet Captain attacks or blocks, other Humans you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Bloodsuckers, howlers, monsters from the beyond . . . it doesn't much matter. I won't have to face them alone."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach Delirium - When Ishkanah, Grafwidow enters the battlefield, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, create three 1/2 green Spider creature tokens with reach. {6}{B}: Target opponent loses 1 life for each Spider you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the wake of Emrakul, some werewolves' human forms were lost forever.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sinuous Predator can't be blocked by more than one creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A different kind of transformation has taken place.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach Discard a card: Noose Constrictor gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "More rope may not be necessary." - Kep, Lunarch inquisitor

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Permeating Mass deals combat damage to a creature, that creature becomes a copy of Permeating Mass.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Woodland geists concluded that Emrakul would be unable to warp the denizens of the forest if the geists got there first.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Somberwald has become a hunting ground for the Dronepack, the group of werewolves that have succumbed to the flesh-twisting power of Emrakul.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Primal Druid dies, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The power of the woods is only ever borrowed."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures with power less than Howling Chorus's power can't block it. Whenever Howling Chorus deals combat damage to a player, create a 3/2 colorless Eldrazi Horror creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures with power less than Shrill Howler's power can't block it. {5}{G}: Transform Shrill Howler.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A werewolf's howl is terrifying, to be sure. But this . . . this was a chilling sound I somehow felt. I fear what will reply to it." - Alena, trapper of Kessig

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Somberwald Stag enters the battlefield, you may have it fight target creature you don't control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Despite the reemergence of werewolves and the proliferation of Eldrazi, elk numbers in the Somberwald have remained steady.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash When Spirit of the Hunt enters the battlefield, each other creature you control that's a Wolf or a Werewolf gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The bonds of the pack transcend time and death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return all land cards from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No matter how much a plane has suffered, there is a way to restore it." - Nissa Revane

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Every evil destroyed is a strike against the enemy." - Erold, Gatstaf springsage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its web is woven so tightly that not even geists can avoid capture.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Fibrous Entangler must be blocked if able. Fibrous Entangler can block an additional creature each combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: ". . . because to be honest, I couldn't tell you." - Halana, Kessig ranger

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tangleclaw Werewolf can block an additional creature each combat. {6}{G}: Transform Tangleclaw Werewolf.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What has long, flesh-rending claws and enormous, bone-crushing teeth?" - Halana, Kessig ranger

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Eldrazi are all too practiced at twisting natural into unnatural." - Nissa Revane

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even on a plane as dark as this one, nature will organize a defense against the unnatural." - Nissa Revane

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature you control with toughness 4 or greater dies, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I tell you, the trees were closing in! It's by the grace of the Heron alone that I made it out of the Ulvenwald!" - Ricton, traveling merchant

property.name: Rules
property.value: Transform up to one target Werewolf you control. Creatures you control gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Show them what it means to be the source of nightmares!" - Ulrich, Krallenhorde alpha

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Wolfkin Bond enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token. Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control gets +3/+3 and gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The magic used by Kessigers is known for its practical applications.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each had seen friends and family taken by the corruption, so each carried an axe at the other's request.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Bloodhall Priest enters the battlefield or attacks, if you have no cards in hand, Bloodhall Priest deals 2 damage to any target. Madness {1}{B}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature you control attacks, defending player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is no saving this world, not anymore. But we shall be its bloody vengeance." - Sorin Markov

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Gisa and Geralf enters the battlefield, mill four cards. Once during each of your turns, you may cast a Zombie creature spell from your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These fiends are slightly less tolerable than you." "A sentiment that warms my heart, sister."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Grim Flayer deals combat damage to a player, surveil 3. (Look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.) Delirium - Grim Flayer gets +2/+2 as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Lifelink When Heron's Grace Champion enters the battlefield, other Humans you control get +1/+1 and gain lifelink until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sigarda was the last uncorrupted archangel, but she would not have to fight alone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Mercurial Geists gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Procedural misstep: provocation of geists for the purpose of yielding more energy can compromise containment units. Next action: clean up mess." - Laboratory notes

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Delirium - When Mournwillow enters the battlefield, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, creatures with power 2 or less can't block this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target blocking creature. Creatures that were blocked by that creature this combat gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Order of Saint Traft cleared the roads of cultists and horrors, opening the way for the villagers to flee Thraben.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Flying When Spell Queller enters the battlefield, exile target spell with mana value 4 or less. When Spell Queller leaves the battlefield, the exiled card's owner may cast that card without paying its mana cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Choose up to two target creatures. Until your next turn, whenever either of those creatures deals combat damage, you draw a card. −2: Tap up to two target nonland permanents. They don't untap during their controller's next untap step. −7: Draw three cards. You get an emblem with "You may cast spells from your hand without paying their mana costs."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature enters the battlefield or transforms into Ulrich of the Krallenhorde, target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn. At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Ulrich of the Krallenhorde.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature transforms into Ulrich, Uncontested Alpha, you may have it fight target non-Werewolf creature you don't control. At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Ulrich, Uncontested Alpha.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +0/+3 and has vigilance. Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A leader can inspire courage, but it is the smiths and healers who truly keep hope alive." - Thalia, heretic cathar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, deathtouch Whenever Aurora of Emrakul attacks, each opponent loses 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I felt compelled to take the twisted stone, and I abandoned my horse's burden to accommodate its weight. Now, its continued glow illuminates my home and warms my mind." - Garner Kroft, Moorland farmer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cryptolith Fragment enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add one mana of any color. Each player loses 1 life. At the beginning of your upkeep, if each player has 10 or less life, transform Cryptolith Fragment.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +2/+2. Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The head of the staff doubles as a brand to anoint the newly inducted.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As it walks across the fallow field, its awkward, loping gait matches the rattling in its head to create a haunting rhythm that chills the bones.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creature spells you cast cost {1} more to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It'll keep the crows away. Works on neighbors too." - Old Rutstein

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lupine Prototype can't attack or block unless a player has no cards in hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ludevic saw it in a dream and set to work immediately, every detail already known. Can such genius be taught?" - Stitcher Geralf

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +3/+1 and must be blocked by an Eldrazi if able. Equip {4}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't stop chopping until the pieces stop wiggling." - Rem Karolus, Slayer of Eldrazi

property.name: Rules
property.value: {5}, {T}, Sacrifice Soul Separator: Exile target creature card from your graveyard. Create a token that's a copy of that card, except it's 1/1, it's a Spirit in addition to its other types, and it has flying. Create a black Zombie creature token with power equal to that card's power and toughness equal to that card's toughness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +3/+3. Whenever equipped creature attacks, it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. Whenever Stitcher's Graft becomes unattached from a permanent, sacrifice that permanent. Equip {2}

property.name: Rules
property.value: Terrarion enters the battlefield tapped. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Terrarion: Add two mana in any combination of colors. When Terrarion is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
Flavor
property.value: Sometimes the weapon wields the bearer.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}: Each player draws a card, then discards a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {R}, {T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn. {3}{R}{R}, {T}: If you both own and control Hanweir Battlements and a creature named Hanweir Garrison, exile them, then meld them into Hanweir, the Writhing Township.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard a card, you may reveal that card and put it on top of your library instead of putting it anywhere else. {T}: Add {C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "May knowledge be our sanctuary." - Yora, academy researcher
